title: The Immigrant and the Golden Coin
description: Detective Lt. Mike McBride Jr. popular hero of the McBride novels, returns for another thrilling adventure. An exquisite and rare golden coin--a one-of-a-kind relic from an ancient civilization--leads to intrigue, extortion, and murder. Mike becomes involved in the smuggling rivalries along the US border with Mexico. Just the right amount of romance is the custom in the McBride books. There may be a wedding, but we're not telling who.
author: Dorothy May Mercer
